dataStructure.name: sid.org.tmforum.tip.cbe.bi.BusinessInteractionItem
dataStructure.description:
The purpose for the BusinessInteraction expressed in terms of a ProductSpecification, ProductOffering, ServiceSpecification or ResourceSpecification or may refer to a Product, Service, or Resource.

This entity is abstract

This entity is optional
dataStructure.label: BusinessInteractionItem

child.name: quantity
child.description:
Quantity of an interaction item involved in an interaction.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: quantity

child.name: action
child.description:
The action to take for an InteractionItem, such as add, change, remove.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: action

child.name: businessInteraction
child.description:
This element is generated from an association end.

This association end has multiplicity 0..1

This association end has aggregation shared

This association end is navigable

This association end is an end of association BusinessInteractionComprisedOf

This association end is optional
child.label: businessInteraction
